entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.StartRequestAsync assertion failed #83486
  • Segmentation fault while executing System.Net tests in linux x64 coreclr #83482
  • System.Net native crash in mono linux x64 #83481
  • SignedCms with Expired certificate but valid timestamp fails with validation #83478
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Web.IHtmlString and System.Web.HtmlString to System.Web.HttpUtility #83477
  • [API Proposal]: Support Asynchronous Signing in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509SignatureGenerator #83476
  • [API Proposal]: Allow the DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute to be used on a class? #83474
  • [API Proposal]: APIs to expose managed objects to COM #83471
    8.0.0
  • Could not resolve SDK location on mac #83469
  • [mono][aot] link static System.Private.CoreLib.dll.a symbol not found #83460
    8.0.0
  • x64 OSX installer test failed #83459
  • System.Numerics.BigInteger: Add/Subtract performance can be improved when size of arguments are different #83457
  • SslStream fails to authenticate in .NET 7.0 but works in .NET 6.0 #83455
    8.0.0
  • Create proxy when deserialize #83454
  • Blazor Wasm Debugging appears to be broken in Chrome 111.0.5563.65 #83452
  • DebuggerTests.AsyncTests.DebuggerTests.AsyncTests.InspectLocalsWithSameNameInDifferentScopesInAsyncMethod_CSharp times out #83449
  • Heap corruption on .NET Tiered Compilation Worker thread detected with mcheck (Ubuntu 18.0.4 .NET 6 (and 7) #83445
  • [wasm] System.Runtime.Tests exiting silently on main #83443
  • Where is the `ServiceBase.CanHandleSessionChangeEvent` ? #83450
  • .Net 7-iOS: Why is the interpreter needed in .Net7 but not in Xamarin.iOS? #83442
  • Intermittent `!AreCetShadowStacksEnabled() || UseSpecialUserModeApc()` assertion when embedding CoreCLR #83437
  • Publishing Blazor WebAssembly With AOT results in a broken app #83466

Closed

  • Accessing a field of a Vector4 causes later codegen to be inefficient if inlined #10045
    Future
  • Inefficient codegen for floating-point operations #1342
    Future
  • Determine how to handle SIMDIntrinsicGetZero, SIMDIntrinsicInit, SIMDIntrinsicUpperSave, and SIMDIntrinsicUpperRestore #37043
    Future
  • Can't build in an ARM64 Windows machine, fails in crosscompontents step #83343
  • Adding direct support for graphics please. #64732
    Future
  • When I use the IP the remote server refuse connection #74093
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress] HardwareIntrinsics_ro fails with "process cannot access the file" error #83298
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Roslyn csc operations sometimes hangs on ppc64le #82847
  • JIT: fold unreachable cases for switch #65368
    8.0.0
  • Huge memory usage regression in dotnet 7 on linux #79633
    8.0.0
  • ObjectFactory should verify against a `null` serviceProvider #82315
    Future
  • W3C Traceparent header is not set by HttpClient #83227
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] make it possible to enable emscripten assertions `-s ASSERTIONS=1` #74346
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Allow user to set `-s ENVIRONMENT` setting #62708
    8.0.0
  • Channel<T> swallows items #83440
  • NativeAOT doesn't generate IL3000 and IL3001 - access to Assembly.Location property #82475
    8.0.0
  • ILLink analyzer produces both IL3000 and IL3002 for AssemblyName.CodeBase method #83088
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\fieldlayout\\fieldlayout\\fieldlayout.cmd #83431
  • JsonSerializerOptions should provide explicit control over chained IJsonTypeInfoResolvers #83095
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 Managed `ThreadPool` / `Thread` performance and reliability degradations #62967
    Future
  • GeneratedComInterface methods don't match Com ABI #83289
    8.0.0
  • Misleading error "Cannot delete an already deleted object" #80167
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • use ROSpan in SslStreamCertificateContext #83485
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Unity managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection
  • SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83483
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Ensure free buffer space when reading TLS messages #83480
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Change LSRA to more efficiently initialize the availableRegs array #83479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not run embuilder minimal build #83475
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Update xarch to track more instruction metadata as flags #83473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Avx512 equality #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Intrinsify max/min on ARM64 with mini JIT #83468
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Add linux-musl-riscv64 RID #83465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • toolchain.cmake: properly set toolchain for crossbuilding on Alpine Linux #83464
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix bug in cloning conditions for jagged array (#83414) #83462
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Replace a load with cheaper mov instruction when possible #83458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Re-order some blocks in runtimelookup #83453
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve and enable writing test wrappers to disk #83444
    test-enhancement
  • WIP: Optimize `ComputeLastIndex` #83441
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix reflection invoke file format issue for generic methods #83438
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add host tests for asset resolution behaviour without fallback graph #83434
    area-Host
  • Runtime lookup clean up, enable for helper-based tail calls #83430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Add property to get owner composite executable #83339
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add lowering for get_One, get_AllBitSet, createScalar(), createScalarUnsafe(). #83402
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Codespaces] Fix prebuild by using newer dotnet sdk #83331
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "[wasm] Add a monitoring phase to jiterpreter traces and discard unproductive ones (#83432)" #83446
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Specify compacting GC in ObjWriter #83447
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • throw specific Authentication exception for ephemeral keys on Windows #83436
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • Switch tests for --depsfile to mocked components #83435
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [wasm] Fix threading startup after emscripten bump #83352
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: Fold unreachable cases for switch in importer. #82793
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: fix bug in cloning conditions for jagged array #83414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ObjectFactory should verify against a null serviceProvider #82739
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fix Test Watcher Timeouts and Log Checker File Reading Issues #83427
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add more binary op intrinsics for ARM64 mini JIT #83337
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • JIT: Remove "add copies" phase #83310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix noisy tests #83448
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] new EmccEnableAssertions and EmccEnvironment MSBuild props #82954
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Produce IL3000 and IL3001 from NativeAOT compiler #83253
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Misleading error "Cannot delete an already deleted object" #83410
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • EventPipe container types optimizations. #83251
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Bump webpack from 5.68.0 to 5.76.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/node-webpack #83418
    arch-wasm, area-codeflow, javascript
  • [wasm] Add INTERP_OPT_JITERPRETER so that jiterp is disabled in debug mode #83363
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Implement JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolverChain. #83358
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Enable EventSource in ILC #83433
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add a monitoring phase to jiterpreter traces and discard unproductive ones #83432
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Implement HResult swapping for generated COM methods. #83348
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix spurious exception while compiling optimized code #83324
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable a failing System.Drawing.Primitives test. #83397
    area-System.Drawing

Updated

  • Fixes #79187 Add MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle) overload #83134
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug CI #83266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce number of gen 2 GC under high memory load #83328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement `ToggleBit` #83400
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove System.Drawing.Common from runtime #83356
    area-System.Drawing
  • Adding support for Vector512 bitwise operations: And, AndNot, Or, OnesComplement, and Xor #83354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Use SOS to dump managed stack traces from a dump on Windows #82867
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Print the state when the align instructions don't match up #83286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tasks] Add auto runtime initialization template to LibraryBuilder #83050
    area-Build-mono
  • Add x86 intrinsics to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wasm] Post 3.1.30 emscripten bump feedback #83391
    8.0.0
  • Implements Requires*Attribute on class behavior for NativeAOT #83417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Change execution order conditions for intellisense swapping and copying msbuild targets. #83117
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change IsolatedStorageFile path for mobile #83380
    area-System.IO, os-android, os-ios
  • [browser] Fix encoding problem when publishing #82833
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [eventpipe] Perform endian aware serialization of structs and arrays above FireETW layer #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • POC for HttpRequestException error codes #82399
    NO-MERGE
  • Arm64: Combine if conditions into compare chains #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [loader] Does find_method_in_class really see null method entries? #83335
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Take advantage of simplifications enabled by folding all indirect access to locals #79722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute fixer should preserve references to const string fields #81997
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Emit GC info into a COMDAT section #83371
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Bump webpack from 5.68.0 to 5.76.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #83420
    arch-wasm, area-codeflow, javascript
  • [NativeAOT] Support exporting methods from referenced assemblies in a formal way #83396
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix paths in "Stripping symbols" message #82215
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
